From: Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@...>

::Grounded/Axis and Co./Lynxiz::
Grounded's memory's continued to flood back to him.  The other half, the 
mechanical one, in a final fight over organic life and it's future on 
Cyberetron proved a failure for the organic bot.  In the battle they 
raged against each other.  With a qucik snap of his wrist the organic 
bot lashed his special energon whips across his arch-enemy's face, 
blinding him instantly. He remembers how the bot crazed, firing al over 
the place, and with a crazy shot it all went black for the protector of 
organic life.  The shot had put his spark into stasis lock. What had 
happened to his foe, his evil half, he did not know. Until not long ago.

Axis looked to Aerotaur. "All right, he's yours.  I am here if you need 
me"  He then turned and noticed Windlord in some trouble.  He fired two 
missiles at the traiter McGowan while Lokk and Seekker continued to fire 
25 shots each at the foe.

Lynxiz ran out after Lynxiz and spotting Stranato decides it is time for 
payback. Firing three discs set for 1 second explosion on impact at him.
